International Day Against Drug Abuse and.title: International Day Against Drug Abuse and Illicit Trafficking

facts.1: Established by the United Nations General Assembly in 1987.
facts.2: Aims to strengthen action and cooperation to achieve the goal of an international society free of drug abuse.
facts.3: The theme for 2021 was 'Share Facts On Drugs, Save Lives.'

International Day in Support of Victims.title: International Day in Support of Victims of Torture

facts.1: Proclaimed by the United Nations General Assembly in 1997.
facts.2: Aims to eradicate torture and ensure the effective functioning of the Convention against Torture.
facts.3: The UN Voluntary Fund for Victims of Torture provides assistance to victims and their families.

facts.1: Celebrates Madagascar's independence from France in 1960.
facts.2: The day is marked with parades, cultural events, and fireworks.
facts.3: Madagascar is known for its unique biodiversity, with many species found nowhere else on Earth.
